MetricDataLink.name: MetricDataLink
MetricDataLink.description: The link between the metric and the data source, such as a report.

DatasourceFieldName.description: The field name of the data source, such as a report summary field.

DataSourceId.description: The ID of the data source.

LastSynchronizationTime.description: The last time the data was synchronized.

Name.description: The name given to the data link record.

TargetId.description: The ID of the metric that the data is linked to.
